code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{BaseURL}from'../../constant/Constants';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewContact=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[data,setData]=useState([]);function DataFetch(){axios.get(BaseURL+"/contact/".concat(id,"/")).then(res=>setData(res.data.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err));}useEffect(()=>{DataFetch();},[]);console.log("data",data);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lg:mx-0 bg-[#083149] px-10 w-full h-full min-h-screen text-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-5xl text-orange-300 normal-case font-semibold mt-4",children:"View Contact Detail"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"flex space-x-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-gray-300 mt-5  hover:bg-gray-400 text-gray-800 font-bold uppercase py-2 px-4 rounded inline-flex items-center ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Back"})})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mt-10 ml-1 mb-10 uppercase text-lg tracking-wide",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["ID: ",data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Name: ",data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Phone Number: ",data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.phone_number]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Address: ",data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.address]})]})})]});};export default ViewContact;
